entry.title: Roseburg mayor calls for investigation into city council conduct
entry.summary: ROSEBURG, Ore. – Following the resignation of a city councilor, Roseburg’s mayor is pushing for an investigation into the council’s behavior to uncover the reasons behind her departure. entry.title: Keep your small business focused with a strategic plan
entry.summary: Creating a strategic plan for a small company is essential for ensuring that your business stays focused, grows sustainably, and adapts to changing conditions. Here’s a straightforward process that’s both practical and adaptable for small businesses: 1. Set the Foundation (Preparation) 2. Analyze the Current State (Where Are You Now?) 3. Set Clear Strategic Goals… The post Keep your small business focused with a strategic plan appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
